snippet: An academy in Florida has quietly produced a group of service members in extraordinarily high demand in the wake of the Afghanistan and Iraq wars: explosive ordnance disposal techs.
abstract: An academy in Florida has quietly produced a group of service members in extraordinarily high demand in the wake of the Afghanistan and Iraq wars: explosive ordnance disposal techs.
lead_paragraph: C.J. Chivers of The New York Times wrote about a group of service members in extraordinarily high demand in the wake of the Afghanistan and Iraq wars: explosive ordnance disposal techs.

headline.main: Military Trains a New Generation of Munitions Experts
